ComicInfo.Penciller: Brian Ching,Clarence Lansang,David Finch,Brian Ching,Clarence Lansang,David Finch
ComicInfo.Summary: Grigorieff challenges Lucien as he tries to liberate Petra from her torture. In the meantime, Agent Green meets Romanov trying to clarify the circumstances for the disappearing of Grigorieff, Lucien and Andromeda.After defeating Lucien, Grigorieff takes hold of Andromeda's mind and through him, she is subdued by Voivodul who is secretely preparing a massive attack against the Mineans...
